snippet.title: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order Expeditions: A MudRunner Game now: https://store.focus-entmt.com/w/expeditions?utm_campaign=Expeditions_ReleaseDateReveal&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube

Get ready to embark on an ever-rewarding scientific journey!

Drive a variety of all-terrain vehicles through treacherous paths, utilizing advanced technologies and high-tech tools to overcome obstacles. Equip your vehicles with essential gadgets like drones or scanners to ensure success in the wild or use tools like metal detectors and camera drones to locate caches of valuable equipment. Build and manage your base, hire a team of top-notch experts to improve your skills, and unlock new possibilities for exploration.

Expeditions: A MudRunner Game will be released on March 5, 2024 on PS5, PS4, Xbox Series, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch & PC.

Pre-order now and receive The Great Don 71 when the game releases.
